Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition: MicrosoftThe new {Evil Empire} (the old one was {IBM}). The basic complaints are, as formerly with IBM, that (a) their system designs are horrible botches, (b) we can't get {source} to fix them, and (c) they throw their weight around a lot. See also {Halloween Documents}.
